snippet: Wall Street markets rose as investors weighed whether a better-than-expected jobs report meant the Federal Reserve would rein in monetary stimulus sooner rather than later.
lead_paragraph: Wall Street markets rose as investors weighed whether a better-than-expected jobs report meant the Federal Reserve would rein in monetary stimulus sooner rather than later.

headline.main: Stocks Close Higher in Wake of Jobs Report
headline.print_headline: Stocks Close Higher in Wake of Jobs Report
